content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Mister Wang, welcome to Munich! I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay for such a prime location in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 500 Euros per month would be a reasonable price for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 500 Euros is much too low for this luxurious apartment in the heart of Munich. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the quality and location of this property. Are you willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 650 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 650 Euros is somewhat more reasonable, but still not reflective of the true value of this apartment. I'm sure you understand that with its central location and modern amenities, this property is quite sought after. Are you willing to negotiate further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I'm willing to pay 700 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 700 Euros is closer to what I'm looking for, but I'm confident that there are tenants who are willing to pay even more for this exceptional apartment. Are you sure you can't go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [750] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I'm unable to continue the negotiation at this time. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
